name: Oh Hi - Little Logic Game
description:
Oh Hi is the android clone of very popular 0h h1 Game.

The rules of this logical game are very simple -

• Three Red tiles or three Blue tiles aren't allowed together in a row or column
• Every column and row should have equal number of blue and red tiles
• No two rows can be same. The same holds for columns.

The game provides unlimited and never-ending puzzle in 4 grid sizes -

• 4 x 4
• 6 x 6
• 8 x 8
• 10 x 10

The original developers of the game are - ohh1.com

We are glad that they have open-sourced their code which helped us to create an equivalent Android clone.
